scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n backend,frontend,auth -c blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev" "npm run dev:auth"
scripts.setup:python: python3 -m venv backend/venv && ./backend/venv/bin/pip install -r backend/requirements.txt -r backend/requirements.txt
scripts.postinstall: echo '\nðŸ“¦ Run \"npm run setup:python\" to install Python dependencies\n'
